tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Rotator cuff repair left shoulder

My mother got injury in her left shoulder region 3 months back following fall from stairs. Initially xray showed some minor fracture in the humerus bone. After 1 month of treatment she didn't able to lift her arm. We met with dr. Nikhil verma Consultant orthopedics at sant parmanand he diagnosed her a case of rotator cuff tear and advised the MRI of shoulder. Then he operated on her with rotator cuff repair of left shoulder. After 2 months of operation she started pain free movements at injured shoulder and doing well now. Highly recommended for complex shoulder injuries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had an accident and sustained leg fracture for which i visited to sant parmanand hospital where i met with Dr. Nikhil verma Consultant orthopedics. He operated and fixed my fracture with plate and nail. They treated promptly and properly, my broken leg regain moving normal function. How serve the injury is and our age will play roles in how you recover. It has been 2 months now i have started walking with support and doing all home activities. Highly recommended for complex fracture cases and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited for fracture treatment 

I got fracture in my left arm 1 yr back then got surgery with some nail in my town. But after 1 yr my fracture site was painful and then i visited at sant parmanand hospital where dr. Nikhil verma Consultant orthopedics attended me and examined me. He said i will be needing  one more operation with bone graft and plate. Then he did the surgery now my fracture has healed completely and i m doing my all activities again.
Highly recommended for all type of orthopaedic surgery and complex fracture cases

Recently I had a consultation with Dr Nikhil for my further  assessments, I am fully satisfied the kind of treatment and now I am back to normal to my daily activities.
